data.title: Transport & Parking Options
data.meta_description: ICC Sydney is walking distance from Town Hall and Central and easily accessible by public transport.
data.text:
TRANSPORT UPDATES

Please check the transport nsw travel alerts for details of any changes to transport services to ICC Sydney.

For any Light Rail update find out more here!

Note: Harbourside Car Park will be closing the pedestrian crossing across the Convention Light Rail Station into Darling Harbour at Iron Wharf Place between Midnight Friday 05 July 2024 to Midnight Sunday 07 July 2024. During this time, pedestrians are advised to walk north to the Pyrmont Bridge area from the car park and then into Darling Harbour precinct around the Mirvac construction site.

ICC Sydney operates two 24 hour car parking stations with a total of 826 parking spaces including 12 accessible parking bays, 25 motorcycle parking spaces, 50 bicycle racks and 25 electric car charge spaces.

The two car park facilities are located within the Exhibition Centre (Car Park 1) and ICC Sydney Theatre (Car Park 2).

Electric Charging bays:

ICC Sydney has 20 electric car charging bays located in Car Park 1. ICC Sydney Theatre has 5 electric car charging bays located on Level 1 in Car Park 2.

Payment information:

Car parking rates are listed below.

ICC Sydney operates as cashless parking only.

Payment for parking can be made using credit card.

*Please note we do not offer pre-booking for car parking.

TICKETLESS – tap credit card/phone pay on entry – no ticket is issued – tap same credit card/phone pay on exit and payment is made.

TICKET– take a ticket on entry, then when ready to exit pay at pay stations or exit gates with ticket and credit card.

Other parking options:

Additionally, there are a number of secure car parks located in and around Darling Harbour including Harbourside Car Park. For a full list of car parking facilities, please visit the Darling Harbour website.

Car Park Height:2.2m

Address:

14 Darling Drive, Sydney, NSW 2000

ICC Sydney Exhibition Centre Car Park (Car Park 1)

ICC Sydney Theatre Car Park (Car Park 2)

Operating hours:

7 Days – 24 hours

Standard parking rates (will apply for all vehicles entering the car parks):
